docs.title: Sample REST API
docs.text:
This is a sample API documentation site created to demonstrate a Docs-as-Code approach.

It shows how API documentation can be: - Version controlled - Structured for developers - Maintained alongside code

This site is intended as a portfolio example.

docs.title: Sending the API Key
docs.text: Include the API key in the request header:

docs.title: Errors
docs.text:
The API uses standard HTTP status codes.

Code Meaning 400 Bad Request 401 Unauthorized 404 Not Found 500 Server Error

docs.title: API Overview
docs.text: This API allows applications to manage users, orders, and payments.

docs.title: HTTP Methods
docs.text: Method Usage GET Retrieve data POST Create data PUT Update data DELETE Remove data

docs.title: Rate Limits
docs.text:
Requests are limited to:

  • 100 requests per minute per API key

If exceeded, the API returns HTTP 429.
